text: Someone Is Waiting For You (The Greater Mother Love Song) is a World War I song written and composed by Al Piantadosi. The song was first published in 1917 by Al. Piantadosi & Co., Inc. in New York, NY.The sheet music cover features an older woman sitting by an open door of a rustic home. The sheet music can be found at the Pritzker Military Museum & Library.Piantadosi, Al. 1917. Someone is waiting for you: the greater mother love song. New York: Al. Piantadosi. == References == Bibliography *Parker, Bernard S. World War I Sheet Music 1. Jefferson: McFarland & Company, Inc., 2007. .
